channel.title: TURN ON, TUNE IN & CHILLOUT
channel.description: All the Downtempo Genres from Chillout & PsyChill to Nujazz, Ethnic, World, Groove, Breakz and Experimental Electronica

item.title: M&Ms @ AMBIENT PARADISE (Boom Festival 2010) Part 1 "The Ambient"

item.title: "SPAGHETTI"
item.description:
Groove/Nujazz/Electronica/Fusion/Chillout

Are you longing for a good Spaghetti Groove?

Don't be shy have a taste!

 

Track list:

 

01 _WAX TAILOR - "Behind The Curtain" (Opening)

02 _PINK FLOYD - "Is There Anyboby Out There" (Panoramic Paralysis Mix)

03 _MIGHTY MATH - "Urba Jettin"

04 _MATERIAL - "The End of Words"(Sample Voice from William Burroughs)

05 _MÃO MORTA - "Pai"

06 _ACE VENTURA & LISH - "The Light" (Bluetech Remix)

07 _THE HERBALIZER - "The Hard Stuff"

08 _WAX TAILOR - "The Ringing Score"

09 _WAX TAILOR - "I Don't Know"

10 _DEADBEAT - "N'import Quoi"

11 _ERNEST RANGLIN - "Bourbon Street Skank"

12 _MC 900 Ft JESUS - "Buried at Sea"

13 _GOTAN PROJECT - "Triptico"

14 _THE DINING ROOMS - "Girotondo Dei Grandi"

15 _LEMMON JELLY - "In the Bath" (Sample Voices from DJ Trajic "Alvree Talking")

16 _PAUL KALKBRENNER - "Queer Fellow"

17 _PAROV STELAR - "Spider"

18 _WAX TAILOR - "Behind The Disguise" (Closing)

 

Recorded Wednesday 8th of July 2009

Length: 1:10:16

Size: 80.5 MB

Bit Rate: 160Kbps Have a nice meal!

item.title: HYPNOSPHERE
item.description: Electronica/Ambient/Psychill Hello everyone, a new musical episode and a new perspective about the amazing music produced all around the globe. HYPNOSPHERE is a deep trip to some minimal alternative tunes and other freestyle electronica. To my Brother Vitor!!! Deep-Ambient-Minimal-Hypnotic-Psychedelic-Melancolic-Electronica Trak list 1. CONSOLE _ "Abdolmem" (MATAD) 2. PAROV STELAR _ "Storm" (ETAGE NOIR) 3. B. FLEICHMANN _ "As if" (MORR MUSIC) 4. DEAD COMBO _ "After Peace Swim Twice" (UNIVERSAL) 5. CINEMATIC ORCHESTRA _ "The Awekwning of a Woman" (NI.TU) 6. iAWAKE _ "Life Cipher" (SPIRAL TRAX) 7. SETI _ "Beacon 05" (INSTINCT AMBIENT) 8. MIGHTY MATH _ "Soulboy" EFA IMPORTS) 9. APHEX TWIN _ "Jynweythek Ylow" (CANTALOUPE MUSIC) 10. A REMINISCENT DRIVE _ "Footprints" (CHIPLE RECORDS) 11. KICK BONG _ "Insence" (CANDYFLIP) > Sample voice from TIM LEARY "Turn on, tune in and drop out" 12. SPACE CAT _ "Spiral" (BARRAMUNDI) 13. DATAR _ "B" (TELSTAR TV) 14. BOB HOLROYD _ "The Release" (SOUNDSCAPE MUSIC) 15. BOB HOLROYD _ "Absence" (SOUNDSCAPE MUSIC) Artwork: Escher - "Hand With Reflecting Sphere" Size: 91.1 MB Bit Rate: 160 kbps Length: 79m 19s Date: Recorded March 2nd 2009 Right-click on Download and save target/link as:

item.title: "GAIA" - FREESTYLE MIX
item.description: Freestyle/Groove/World/Indie This time something completely different, a trip to the feminine emotional universe, from joyful & sensual tunes to deep and melancholic ambients. Dedicated to the one i love! :) Track list: > - Laurie Anderson > Sample from _ "Born, Never Asked" - (Warner Bros) 1 - Xerxes > Vocals by Aleah _"Inhale" - (Electrik Dream) 2 - Sneaker Pimps > Vocals by Kelly Dayton _"Post Modern Sleaze" - (Clean Up Rec) 3 - Zap Mama > Vocals by Marie Daulne _"Songe" - (Luaka Bop Rec) 4 - Recoil > Vocals by Diamanda Galas _ "Strange Hours" - (Mute Corporation) 5 - Umpletrue _ "Budapest in T" - (Cobra Disco) 6 - Massive Attack > Vocals by Sara Jay _"Dissolved Girl" - (SBA/GALA Rec) 7 - Kaya Project _ "Raag to Raaga" _ (Interchill) 8 - Gotan Project > Vocals by Cristina Villalonga _ (XL Recordings) 9 - Goldfrapp > Vocals by Alison Goldfrapp _ "Human" - (Mute records) 10 - Recoil > Vocals by Rosa Torras & Diamanda Galas _ "Vertigen" - (Mute Corporation) > - Lucy Liu from Kill bill soundtrack - (Maverick) 11 - PJ Harvey _ "A Place called Home" - (Universal Music) > - Laurie Anderson > Sample from _ "Born, Never Asked" - (Warner Bros) 12 - Banco de Gaya > Vocals by jennifer Folker _ "Gray over Gray" - (Disco Genko) Artwork by Francesca Woodman Length: 73:14 Bit Rate: 160kbps Size: 83.9 MB Recorded November 2008 Right Click on Download and save link as: Fell free to leave a comment or send feedback to the email! Enjoy the ride
